label: usedMaterial
comment: A substance from which something is or could be made.

rangeIncludes.comment: A substance from which something is or could be made.

domainIncludes.comment: Improving measures for manufactured components or products to meet end use requirements.
A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.
Improving measures for manufactured components or products to meet end use requirements.
